//: Reminder that these appears in the debug spellcasting. Disable the mod if you're testing spell-related stuff!
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster deals an instant death damage, sacrificing itself upon casting a spell that's been combined with.'
null... just ignore this.

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'The torn up ligament explodes internally, dealing an extra bio damage to the target.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster scratches the target with a claw imbued in volatile bodily fluid, dealing moderate cutting damage that lingers for few turns.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'If the target is nearby, caster slashes with a vine, dealing moderate cutting damage. This is casted 2 times.'

(Combo) spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster sends its sharp leaves to mince the targets in a line, dealing moderate cutting damage.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Floral bloom accompanies the wild outburst, spreading sleep-inducing pollens in the same area.'

(Combo) spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its body to create an outburst of twisted roots and vines under the target, dealing moderate stabbing damage and ensnares all affected creatures.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its hand to create and send forth 2 triffids, along with the wild outgrowth.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'When upclose, caster then scratches the target with its excess blood, dealing acid damage.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its hands to extract a large amount of acidic fluid from its body, then sends it to the target in a short but wide line, dealing moderate acid damage that lingers overtime.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'If the target is nearby, caster sweeps some of the excess fluids in a small cone, dealing small damage to all creatures.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster channels its whole body for a very long time to produce an extremely vast amount of corrosive bodily fluids and sends it up above the target then explodes, dealing tremendous acid damage to all creatures in the vicinity, which lingers within time.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'A multi-dimensional portal is made from the collapse. This portal leads the carrion race into the world.'

Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'After channeling for a massive amount of time, caster's gravitational force field collapses, creating a supernova, dealing tremendous bash damage to all creatures. Sparkling objects are scattered, which enlightens the area.'
//: Basically, an enemy target has to be the center of explosion, so that Spells get casted successfully.
